message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to purchase this item at a special introductory price of $950000. We're confident it will meet your needs and expectations. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your perspective and respect your valuation of our product. To better align with your expectations, we propose to sell the product to you at a price of $900000. This still represents a significant discount compared to the market value, while ensuring we cover our costs and maintain a reasonable profit margin.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $925000. I believe this is a fair price that works for both parties.
